item.title: Welcome
item.author: david_4_1_4@hotmail.com (David Macías)
item.description: I have been playing with the idea of having a coding blog in English for some time now. I will be writing some posts about programming in Java, automation and anything code related really in this web. I plan to publish one post per week. I want the posts to be useful and solve a particular problem I stumble upon in my work.
